title: Create CLI crate
description: Create crates/cli/Cargo.toml depending on core, main.rs that prints version, add clap dependency

title: Verify build and run
description: Run cargo build, cargo test, cargo run -- --version to verify everything works

title: Initialize cargo workspace
description: Create root Cargo.toml with workspace definition, add workspace dependencies (petgraph, serde, anyhow), create crates/ directory

title: Epic 1: Workspace & Foundation
description: Set up minimal two-crate workspace (cli + core) with placeholder graph structures. See docs/plans/2025-01-20-epic1-workspace-foundation.md

title: Create core crate with basic graph types
description: Create crates/core/Cargo.toml, lib.rs with module declarations, graph.rs with Node/Edge/Graph types, empty parser/mod.rs and queries.rs
